Description:
A General detection for sdclt being spawned as an elevated process. This could be an indicator of sdclt being used for bypass UAC techniques.

Author: Roberto Rodriguez (Cyb3rWard0g), OTR (Open Threat Research)
Sigma Repository: [GitHub](https://github.com/SigmaHQ/sigma)
Name: Potential UAC Bypass Via Sdclt.EXE
Query: sourcetype='windows-sysmon' eql select * from _source_ where process_path like '%sdclt.exe' and (integrity_level = 'high' or integrity_level = 's-1-16-12288')
